title: About LGC
subtitle: Who We Are
description: LGC (Let's Get Connected) is a student-driven IoT and embedded systems team built on collaboration, innovation, and practical execution. We specialize in projects that require a tight integration of hardware and software, ensuring that every system we build is functional, scalable, and industry-relevant.
